listitem.para: The number of half-open IKE SAs before the pluto IKE daemon will be placed in busy mode. When in busy mode, pluto activates anti-DDoS counter measures. The default is 25000. Currently, counter measures consist of requiring IKEv2 anti-DDoS cookies on new incoming IKE requests. The IKE daemon can be forced into busy mode using ipsec whack --busy or by specifying the force-busy=yes option.
